sentences.en: A convex lens is used to concentrate rays of light.
An indifference curve is usually assumed to be convex.
sentences.cn: 无差异曲线通常呈凸形.

sentences.en: Convex analysis, Lagrangian relaxation, non differentiable optimization, and applications in integer programming.
sentences.cn: 凸分析 、 拉格朗日松弛法 、 不可微分函数最适化以及在整数规划上的应用.

sentences.en: For some special cases, the deterministic convex optimization problems are derived.
sentences.cn: 对某些特殊的情形, 我们导出了鲁棒线性最优化的确定性等价问题.

sentences.en: I wouldn't say your stomach was big — it's just slightly convex.
sentences.cn: 我不会说你的肚子大——它只是有点凸出.

sentences.en: In adults its contour may be straight, slightly concave or slightly convex.
sentences.cn: 成人肺其形状可以是直的, 轻微凹下或轻度突出.

sentences.en: Its convex border should project far into the right lower lung field.
sentences.cn: 其凸出缘应深深地突入右下肺野内.

sentences.en: The convex surfaces faces toward the left.
The importance of the commercial bank service management is already convex now.
sentences.cn: 商业银行服务管理的重要性已经凸现.

sentences.en: The inferior and lateral convex border of the stomach is the greater curvature.
sentences.cn: 胃的下方及侧面凸缘是胃大弯.

sentences.en: The representation theorem with order - extremal points is obtained for compact order - convex sets.
sentences.cn: 研究了序凸集的一些运算性质,得到了紧序凸集的序端点表示定理.

sentences.en: The surface of the space key can be flat or convex.
sentences.cn: 空格键则可以是平面或凸面.

sentences.en: This paper given discribes a convex persevering fitting method.
sentences.cn: 文中描述了一种保凸参数拟合方法.

sentences.en: What causes the conversion and why does it have a convex casing?
sentences.cn: 它为什么有个凸起的外壳 呢 ?

sentences.en: When there is a diminishing marginal rate substitution, preferences are convex.
sentences.cn: 边际替代率是逐渐减少的, 偏好就会凸起.

trans.tran_en: curved outwards, like the surface of the eye
